radius.description: search radius (in kilometers) from where you are

months.description: number of months to look ahead

licenseType.description: exam for license to search for

licenseNumber.description: license number to log in with

licenseExpiry.description: expiry date for license expressed in YYYY/MM/DD to log in with

chromiumPath.description: Path to Chromium-based browser executable, make sure not to use the browser you regularly use (HCaptcha may flag it as a bot and prevent you from accessing the site normally). If a value is not given to this option, Chromium will be downloaded to this folder.
